description: This header file declares internal functions related to HTTP Authentication Client operations, including processing requests and responses, generating digest responses and nonces, managing authentication information, and handling internal state.

methods.name: HttpAuthcoProcessRequest
methods.description: Processes an HTTP request within the authentication client context.

methods.name: HttpAuthcoProcessResponse
methods.description: Processes an HTTP response within the authentication client context.

methods.name: HttpAuthcoGenerateDigestResponse
methods.description: Generates the digest response string for HTTP authentication.

methods.name: HttpAuthcoGenerateCNonce
methods.description: Generates a client nonce for digest authentication.

methods.name: HttpAuthcoGetNC
methods.description: Retrieves the nonce count for digest authentication.

methods.name: HttpAuthcoAddAuthInfo
methods.description: Adds authentication information based on an authentication challenge.

methods.name: HttpAuthcoFindAuthInfo
methods.description: Finds stored authentication information for a request.

methods.name: HttpAuthcoFindAuthInfo2
methods.description: Finds authentication info with parent URI consideration.

methods.name: HttpAuthcoSetAcmIf
methods.description: Sets the interface for the authentication client manager.

methods.name: HttpAuthcoReset
methods.description: Resets the internal state of the HTTP authentication client.
